body_html: Actually, perhaps I'm overthinking this. The error message suggests that an empty filename is being passed to the Saver.restore() method. Perhaps there's a typo in "${INCEPTION_CHECKPOINT}"? Or a bug in the script that's taking the filename from a different flag? (I don't know what code you're running, so it's hard to guess at what the bug could be.)

body: Actually, perhaps I'm overthinking this. The error message suggests that an empty filename is being passed to the `Saver.restore()` method. Perhaps there's a typo in `"${INCEPTION_CHECKPOINT}"`? Or a bug in the script that's taking the filename from a different flag? (I don't know what code you're running, so it's hard to guess at what the bug could be.)
